Today in South Devon, Bantham is the spot to be with a solid 4 ft @ 7s SW swell and light 12 mph S winds, making for clean conditions. Tomorrow, conditions take a turn with a hefty 9 ft @ 9s WSW swell but strong 38 mph WSW winds will make it blown out. On the day after, Bantham bounces back with a more manageable 5 ft @ 8s SW swell and lighter 9 mph SW winds, offering a better chance for some fun waves. Best: today.
